## PreloadPlugin type

### PreloadPlugin type

Describes the plugins that should be preloaded prior to start Grafana.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare type PreloadPlugin = {
    path: string;
    version: string;
};
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { PreloadPlugin } from '@grafana/data';
```
